name: apigee_organizations_environments_securityIncidents_batchUpdate
description: BatchUpdateSecurityIncident updates multiple existing security incidents.

parent.description: Optional. The parent resource shared by all security incidents being updated. If this is set, the parent field in the UpdateSecurityIncidentRequest messages must either be empty or match this field.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

requests.description: Optional. Required. The request message specifying the resources to update. A maximum of 1000 can be modified in a batch.

updateMask.description: Required. The list of fields to update. Allowed fields are: LINT.IfChange(allowed_update_fields_comment) - observability LINT.ThenChange()

detectionTypes.description: Output only. Detection types which are part of the incident. Examples: Flooder, OAuth Abuser, Static Content Scraper, Anomaly Detection.

displayName.description: Optional. Display name of the security incident.

firstDetectedTime.description: Output only. The time when events associated with the incident were first detected.

lastDetectedTime.description: Output only. The time when events associated with the incident were last detected.

lastObservabilityChangeTime.description: Output only. The time when the incident observability was last changed.

name.description: Immutable. Name of the security incident resource. Format: organizations/{org}/environments/{environment}/securityIncidents/{incident} Example: organizations/apigee-org/environments/dev/securityIncidents/1234-5678-9101-1111

observability.description: Optional. Indicates if the user archived this incident.

riskLevel.description: Output only. Risk level of the incident.

trafficCount.description: Total traffic detected as part of the incident.
